name: GRAND.
description:
"It's with bad sentiments that one makes good novels."
 
Enclosed is the Executable, written in the C programming language, for an interactive novel, written within the last two weeks of NaNoRenoMMXX.
 
If this garners any praise, then it may be developed further.
 
This work is Mature, owing to the following factors:
 
-       Drug references.
-       Profanity.
-       Sexual themes.
-       Mental Health Issues.
-       Long monologues.
-       Intersexual Communication. (the scariest of them all.)
 
H!GHL!GHTS:
 
MULTIPLE ENDINGS; DECISIONS MATTER.
 
TWO LEVELS of DIFFICULTY, offering DIFFERENT PR!ZES.
 
TEXT is DRAMATIC and abounds in CONTEXT.
 
15 CHARACTERS, E!GHT of whom are PLAYABLE.
 
REWARD for unlocking all ACHIEVEMENTS.
 
CRYPTIC SYSTEM.
 
CAPTIVATING, THOUGHT-PROVOKING STORY.
 
COMPLEX PLOT, warranting multiple play-throughs.
 
OVER 9000 lines of SOURCE CODE.
 
If you get a Pop-Up Window barring access at the end of any scene, simply select “Ignore”.
All you need is Love and a Keyboard. 
DON't BE AFRA!D to download the Game!! If your Malware Finder gets weird about it, it's only because the program is written in a very classic code, as happens unfortunately to be a fair deal of known Malware. While such archaic code may still be used by hackers since it's closer to the heart of a machine, (less abstract than most,) my own code is harmless, and I will stake my whole career upon this Promise.
 
Enjoy.
 
[({L.J.)}]
